mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT member_nickname FROM member WHERE member.member_id = (SELECT member_id FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem_idx = alarm.orderItem_idx)) as 'member_nickname' FROM alarm WHERE member_id = #{member_id} order by alarm_date desc limit 0, 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm SELECT orderItem_idx, member_id, concat(orderitem_state), now(), orderItem_idx FROM orderitem WHERE orderitem.orderItem_idx = ${orderItem_idx}
